title: Do Pakistani students and teachers refer to Indian YouTube videos for studies in maths and science? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes I still remember that one day when I was scrolling down the comment section of Alakh sir’s(aka Physics wallah sir) video of physics, I observed that a student commenting “thank you sir love from Pakistan”. Not only pakistani many students of other countries like Bangladesh, Nepal etc. refer to Indian videos for studies.
